content.question: Most plastics pose a special problem in the waste stream because they

choices.label: decompose readily in water and become a source of water pollution
decompose to produce methane, which is explosive and creates a significant hazard
decompose slowly, if at all, and persist as solid waste
release radioactive isotopes when they decompose
release ozone when they are recycled

content.answer: decompose slowly, if at all, and persist as solid waste
